title: Community BBQ This Saturday
body: We’re hosting our annual neighborhood BBQ this Saturday at the park! Bring a side dish or dessert to share. Burgers, hot dogs, and veggie options will be provided. Family and friends are welcome!

title: Lost Dog Near Maple Street
body: Small golden retriever named Luna went missing last night near Maple and 4th. She’s friendly but may be scared. Please call 555-0192 if you see her.

title: Garage Sale Weekend
body: Several neighbors are doing a community garage sale next weekend! Great chance to declutter and find some treasures. Tables available on a first‑come basis.

title: Tree Trimming Schedule
body: City crews will be trimming trees along Oak Avenue between Aug 10–12. Please move vehicles off the street during that time. Thanks for your cooperation!

title: New Recycling Bins Arriving
body: New blue recycling bins will be delivered to each home next week. Please start using them right away. Old bins will be picked up the following Monday.

title: Neighborhood Watch Meeting
body: We’re restarting the neighborhood watch group! Meeting will be held at the community center on August 25 at 6 PM. Let’s keep our streets safe together.

title: Community Garden Expansion
body: We’re adding six new plots to the community garden this fall! Sign‑ups open September 1. Priority goes to residents without existing plots. Bring your own tools if possible.

title: Power Outage Notice
body: There will be a planned power outage on September 8 from 1 AM to 5 AM for maintenance. Please plan accordingly and unplug sensitive electronics.

title: Fall Clean-Up Day
body: Our annual fall clean-up is coming up September 14. Volunteers needed to help collect trash, trim bushes, and repaint fences. Meet at the park entrance at 9 AM.

title: Block Party Volunteers Needed
body: We’re looking for volunteers to help plan the October block party. Tasks include decorations, games, and food setup. Sign up online or drop by the clubhouse.

title: Halloween Decoration Contest
body: Get ready for spooky season! Decorate your house for Halloween. Judging will happen on October 28 and prizes go to the top three homes. Everyone welcome to participate!

title: New Playground Opening
body: We’re excited to announce the grand opening of the new playground on October 15! Ribbon cutting starts at 10 AM with snacks and games for the kids. Thank you to everyone who donated and helped make it happen!
